title: Caught
description: An interconnected standalone featuring mature themes.FIND A WOMAN, KEEP A WOMANFor centuries, all the men in my family have captured their brides.Mine died, leaving me and my one year old son behind to grieve.But five years have passed, and I’m moving on.IT’S TIME TO GO HUNTINGI’m Mitchell Shay, and I’m bringing back a mother for my son Amos.There’s no escaping this, Corina. It’s you and me. Us.This is what it means to be a Shay.*Updated 07/2024 to include an epilogue
author: M.L. Marian
